name: Music
description: I play guitar and will sing anywhere within 3 feet of a shower. Anyway here's wonderwall.

name: Surfing
description: There's no better feeling than getting that perfect wave and actually not wiping out. I've had some of my best memories and faced my biggest challenges in the water.

name: Web Development
description: Brainstorming an idea and spending the next 12 hours banging your head against the wall until it works is my addiction. It's because then you can say you've created something of your own (or at least have a very compelling story of why it didn't work out).

name: Dogs
description: The one on the left is Buster, and the one on the right is Eddie. They're my Chiweenies!

name: Tennis
description: I've been playing for a while now, so if there's one thing tennis has taught me, it's to never give up. That, and if you hit a bad lob at the net.. you duck.

name: Skateboarding
description: I've picked up a lot of scars through the years, but each one comes with an equally rewarding success story. Except the time I "credit carded." That's when you call it a day.

name: Manga
description: I like to read, but only if the book has pictures. Naturally, reading the newest releases every Thursday morning is tradition.
